title: 3 bd 1 bath w/balconies, 2nd fl walk-up
posting_body: 3 bedrooms, 1 full bath, kitchen, spacious livingroom + pantry and laundry room with washer and gas dryer (owner supplied) in unit, front and rear balconies, small outdoor area in rear for play and entertainment.
Hardwood floors, granite counters, forced hot air heating system.
2nd floor walk up, in a triple decker home with friendly neighbors.
Walking distance to restaurants, library, shopping, salons, transportation, t-station, 15 min walk to Milton.
Is having awesome landlords a plus?
But seriously- We don’t abandon renters!!
Respect is mutual and the relationship reciprocal.
Something goes wrong we fix it promptly.
We’re down to earth and would love to hear from you if you’re interested!
